rotate_rotor.description: Rotate the rotor as needed for typical operation.

slide_in_slider.description: Slide in the slider to adjust the fan's operation.

slide_out_slider.description: Slide out the slider to adjust the fan's operation.

clean_frame.description: Clean the fan's frame to ensure proper maintenance.

clean_slider.description: Clean the slider to ensure smooth operation.

clean_rotor.description: Clean the rotor to remove dust or any other particles.

clean_entire_fan.description: Clean the entire fan, including the frame, slider, and rotor.
